post.author: 강윤정
post.content:
Hi, Mr.Choi. I tried to connect ftp server as a anonymous user. but it refused anonymous user with this msg...
H:\kahngj>ftp comm1.wo.to Connected to comm1.wo.to. 220 OOPS Account Server ready .. User (comm1.wo.to:(none)): anonymous 331 Anonymous login ok, send your complete email address as your password. Password: 530-Unable to set anonymous privileges. 530 Login incorrect. Login failed.
Could you check this again? Thank you.
post.title: [To admin]ftp server doesn't allow anonymous user in.
